      • map

        public static <R,T> R[] map(T[] array,
                            java.util.function.Function<? super T,? extends R> f)
        Convenience method for Arrays.stream(array).map(f).collect(Collectors.toList()).toArray(new R[array.length]) .
        Type Parameters:
        R - Type of result array elements
        T - Type of input array elements
        Parameters:
        array - An array
        f - function which maps array elements
        Returns:
        An array of mapped elements
